app_descript:
Paylocity Mobile

Brief

Paylocity Mobile, designed for clients of Paylocity, is an essential tool for both employees and managers to handle various workplace tasks on the go. To utilize this app, users are required to be authorized Paylocity customers with valid credentials. The app offers a wide array of functionalities, ranging from personal information management to work schedule oversight, ensuring a comprehensive mobile HR solution.

Core Features

  • Personal Info Management & Directory: Edit personal details and browse the company directory anytime, anywhere üìá.
  • Time Tracking & Geo-Fencing: Clock in/out with ease, supported by geo-fencing technology and historical location views ‚è∞.
  • Acknowledgements & Company News: Access and acknowledge vital company links and stay updated with the latest announcements üì¢.
  • Impressions & Time Management: Send and receive recognition through Impressions, check schedules, and manage time effectively üåü.
  • Expense Reporting & Journal Entries: Submit expense reports and create journal entries with just a few taps üíº.

Pros

  • Accessibility: Manage work-related tasks remotely, adding convenience to your daily routine üëç.
  • Real-Time Notifications: Stay informed with push notifications for time off requests and paycheck availabilities üîî.
  • Enhanced Security: Benefit from biometric login features and encrypted data transmission for peace of mind üõ°Ô∏è.
  • Managerial Functions: Approve timesheets, manage team schedules, and oversee direct reports' activities efficiently üí°.

Cons

  • Limited Access: Only accessible to Paylocity customers with proper credentials, not suitable for freelancers or users from other HR services üë§.
  • Company-Specific Features: May have varying access permissions and features depending on the company's setup üè¢.
  • Session Timeouts: Automatic timeouts could interrupt workflow if the app is inactive, potentially causing inconvenience ‚åõ.
  • Account Locks: Multiple failed login attempts will lock the user account, requiring admin support to regain access üîí.

Price

  • The Paylocity Mobile app is free to download, while the usage is contingent on being part of a Paylocity-enrolled organization. In-app functionalities are provided as part of Paylocity's HR services.

Download Paylocity Mobile from the App Store or Get it on Google Play
